name: SOLITARY [Game Jam Demo Version]
description:
An atypical Yume Nikki fangame being developed over 4-5 weeks for the 6th Dream Diary Jam.

You play as someone led astray in his pursuit of isolation.
He explores a labyrinthian underground composed of his most tired fantasies and worst nightmares.

This is only the demo, and definitely lacks much of any content representative of the goals for the full game. My apologies for that- mistakes were made on the technical side of things.

Audio and visuals are subject to change.
